body:
Hello, is anyone elses connection to avicus shxt? like mine is horrible and i disconnect every 5 minutes due to lag.

However now my whole wi fi is slowing down.

Here is a few specs i use for my WiFi connection.

I use a D-Link DWA-131 Wireless adapter 

Windows 8.1 

This PC was made in 2013, is it time for an upgrade? I can't upgrade until 2 years, unfortunely... well if it's urgent i can.

Please give me some help, THANKS!!!
